backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, student directory (with CRUD and sorting), announcements, class schedules, and events with role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of homepage, student directory, announcements, class schedules, events calendar, and educational theme with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including App.tsx, Layout, pages (Home, Students, Announcements, Schedules, Events), hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system with navy blue and gold educational theme for light and dark modes with comprehensive design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'Phuba Government High School' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with five routes (home, students, announcements, schedules, events), ThemeProvider, Layout wrapper, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Responsive layout component with sticky header, school branding with GraduationCap icon, navigation links, authentication button, mobile menu, and footer with social media links.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without profiles to enter their name on first login, preventing dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with identity-based authentication, automatic query invalidation on identity changes, and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, students, announcements, class schedules, and events using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a navy-and-gold educational theme for both light and dark modes, including color tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Displays school announcements with authentication check, allows admins to create new announcements via dialog form, and shows formatted timestamps for each announcement.
frontend/src/pages/ClassSchedulePage.tsx: Shows class schedules filtered by grade with authentication requirement, displays schedules in a grid layout with grade badges for filtering.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays school events calendar with authentication check, allows admins to create events with date/time, and distinguishes between upcoming and past events.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component with hero section displaying school logo and name, plus feature cards linking to students, announcements, schedules, and events sections with icons and descriptions.
Student directory page with authentication check, search/filter functionality by name or class, and displays student cards with name, ID, and class information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for container, border radius, fonts, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features including homepage, student directory, announcements, schedules, events calendar, and educational theme styling for Phuba Government High School app.
